summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 27th Avenue Northeast, from East 55th Street to East 65th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 88516 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
